formulaTemplates.name: VM0049 Baseline Emissions - Equation 1
formulaTemplates.description: Baseline emissions in year y (tCO2e) = Mass of CO2 injected (tCO2) and monitored at injection point i in year y at the storage site(s) minus the QCO2,nonVCS,injected.

formulaTemplates.name: VM0049 Measurement based on Total Mass Flow. Equation 1, option 1 - Equation 2
formulaTemplates.description: To determine the quantity of CO2 using total mass flow measurements, the project proponent must multiply the total mass flow by the concentration of CO2 in that flow.

formulaTemplates.name: VM0049 Derive Mass fraction from the mole fraction (XCO2) measured - Equation 3.
formulaTemplates.description: M_CO2 = Molar mass of CO2 (g/mol), X_CO2 = Mole fraction of CO2 in flow at flow meter x (% mole), M_k = Molar mass of component k (g/mol), X_k = Mole fraction of component k in flow at flow meter x (% mole), n = Number of components in the mixture with a mole fraction greater than 0.5% (5000 ppm), or for supercritical conditions greater than 0.25% (2500 ppm)
